TITLE: House Democrats push for Biden’s billionaire minimum income tax
SUMMARY: House Democrats have introduced the Billionaire Minimum Income Tax Act, calling for a 20% levy on total income for households worth more than $100 million.

TITLE: Tom Brady worries wealth will keep his kids from growing up grounded: 'Guys, this is not ... reality'
SUMMARY: NFL quarterback Tom Brady says explaining to his wealth to his kids is the "hardest part" of parenting. Here's why.

TITLE: The Mega Millions jackpot has now surged to $1.28 billion. This is the tax bill if you happen to win
SUMMARY: Strong ticket sales have pushed the jackpot up to $1.28 billion for Friday night's drawing. It's now the third-largest lottery prize ever.

TITLE: Here are 4 key things to consider if you actually hit the $1.28 billion Mega Millions jackpot
SUMMARY: While the odds are stacked against you snaring the top prize, it's worth giving thought to what you actually would do if you were to win.

TITLE: A toxic culture and ‘race to the bottom’: Pilots open up on why air travel is in chaos
SUMMARY: Pilots for major airlines described opportunism and a desire to cut costs throughout the industry as worsening the situation travelers are facing today.

TITLE: New Zealand had one of the world's strictest Covid lockdowns. Now its borders are fully reopening
SUMMARY: After more than two years, New Zealand is lifting its strict border controls and is set to welcome back all international travelers on Sunday.

TITLE: U.S. economy continues to shrink and many aren't prepared for an economic downturn. Here's what advisors are telling clients as recession fears grow
SUMMARY: As the U.S. economy shrinks for a second straight quarter, many aren't prepared for an economic downturn. Here's what advisors are telling their clients.

TITLE: Elon Musk has taken even shorter flights than Kylie Jenner's 17-minute trip, says jet-tracking teen
SUMMARY: Jack Sweeney, a college sophomore who tracks billionaires' and celebrities' jets, says Elon Musk has taken shorter flights than Kylie Jenner's recent 17-minute trip.

TITLE: Here's how advisors are shifting clients' portfolios as the Federal Reserve again hikes rates by 75 basis points
SUMMARY: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday raised its interest rates again, by another 75 basis points, to combat soaring inflation. Here's how portfolios are shifting.

TITLE: Top Federal Reserve officials say they misread inflation and now plan to correct the course
SUMMARY: It's the Federal Reserve task to tame inflation that is running at a pace not seen in four decades. To do so, it has been hiking interest rates at a fast pace.

TITLE: Millennials' average net worth more than doubled during the pandemic. Here’s what advisors say they should do next
SUMMARY: Millennials' average net worth more than doubled during the pandemic, and real estate makes up more than one-third of their financial assets.

TITLE: Mark Cuban's $20 million ‘Shark Tank’ investing strategy: 'Sometimes my deals are purely to help someone or send a message'
SUMMARY: Billionaire Mark Cuban says he's comfortable losing money from his investments on ABC's "Shark Tank" — because his strategy isn't only about making money.

TITLE: These are the cheapest — and most expensive — cities in Europe to visit this year
SUMMARY: Flights and hotel costs are down in many parts of Europe, with prices in some locations lower than they were before the pandemic.

TITLE: The Mega Millions jackpot is now up to $830 million. Here's how much would go to taxes if there's a winner
SUMMARY: Ahead of Tuesday night's draw, the jackpot has already been adjusted upward twice and now is an estimated $830 million.

TITLE: Nearly 20% of Americans are afraid to check their credit card statements as interest rates approach an all-time high
SUMMARY: As credit card debt swells and interest rates spike, many spenders are fearful about high balances. Here's what to know if you're dealing with credit card debt.

TITLE: Early retiree shares 13 'stupid simple' money rules that helped him save $1 million: 'I wasn't born rich'
SUMMARY: Self-made millionaire Steve Adcock and his wife retired in their 30s. They didn't inherit money or have a side hustle. Instead, he attributes their early retirement to 13 money habits.

TITLE: More advisors turn to alternative investments to further diversify their clients in volatile market
SUMMARY: After battling downturns in the stock and bond markets, more advisors are turning to alternative investments, according to a recent survey.

TITLE: Mark Cuban says this was his worst 'Shark Tank' investment ever: 'Next thing you know, all of the money’s gone'
SUMMARY: After more than a decade on ABC's "Shark Tank," Mark Cuban recently singled out the worst investment he's ever made on the show: the Breathometer.

TITLE: The wealthy now have more time to avoid estate taxes, thanks to an IRS change
SUMMARY: If your family has significant wealth, it's now easier to avoid federal estate taxes, thanks to recent changes from the IRS. Here's what to know.

TITLE: A 'joy fund' helped me overcome my scarcity mindset and start building wealth: Here's how
SUMMARY: The Wealthy Wolfe founder Parween Mander shares the steps she took to change her mental approach to money and starting building wealth.

TITLE: Top travel tips: 5 ways to save money on flights and hotels as prices rise
SUMMARY: Travelers are spending more to travel this summer, but that doesn't mean they want to. Here's how to save on summer flights, hotels and trips amid rising costs.

TITLE: If you win the $630 million Mega Millions jackpot, here's how much would go to taxes
SUMMARY: With no ticket matching all six numbers drawn Tuesday night, the jackpot has surged to $630 million for Friday night's pull.

TITLE: Investors have put $43 billion in dividend-paying funds this year. Before you 'chase dividends,' here's what to know
SUMMARY: With increased fears of a possible recession, investors seeking steady income may turn to stocks paying quarterly dividends. Here's what to know before buying.

TITLE: If your goal is to be financially independent, ask yourself 4 questions
SUMMARY: Grant Sabatier is one of the FIRE movement's prominent millionaires. But others should think hard before jumping on the bandwagon, he says.

TITLE: Should you rent or buy a house? Use the 'BURL' rule to avoid financial regret, says real estate investor
SUMMARY: When it comes to maximizing your lifestyle and wealth, the question "should you rent or buy a home?" is one of the most heavily debated. A real estate investor and self-made millionaire shares a simple rule to help you decide.

TITLE: A can of Coca-Cola for $13? Prices are rising on one of Europe's most popular islands
SUMMARY: Though Spain is generally considered a reasonably priced travel destination, the island of Ibiza has long been known as a place for living the high life.

TITLE: Vegas home builder bets $32.5 million spec mansion will smash a local record in Southern California
SUMMARY: A newly built cliff-side mansion overlooking the Pacific Ocean in Southern California comes with an ambitious $32.5 million asking price.

TITLE: Bill Gates plans to give away 'virtually all' his $113 billion—here's the impact that could actually have
SUMMARY: Bill Gates announced a $20 billion donation to the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation – and reiterated a pledge to give away "virtually all of my wealth."

TITLE: These are the 5 markets where home sales are cooling fastest: Sellers need to be 'realistic' about price, says broker
SUMMARY: After the frenzy of bidding wars, the U.S. housing market is cooling amid rising mortgage interest rates, forcing some sellers to adjust.

TITLE: Lawmaker urges Yellen, Treasury Department to remove 'red tape' for Series I bonds
SUMMARY: As the cost of living soars, one lawmaker is urging the Treasury Department to remove the barriers to buying Series I bonds.
